attributes.additional_details: Because our LT members are deadly serious about using this
attributes.background: We need to make a change

rejection.details:
We understand you're concerned about CCN, however it's not clear what that is, nor what it is that is stopping them from using ':success:'.

In any case, we can't accept petitions which call for action relating to a specific individual, organisation or business.

If you choose to start another petition in the future, please ensure you use your full, real name.
